definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
to ascertain/to act on/to criticize/to pass on/classifier for batches, lots, military flights/tier (for the ranking of universities and colleges)

sentences.english: Objective To explore diagnosis and treatment methods of a batch of extensive burn combined with burst injury of lung.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討成批特重燒傷合併衝擊傷的診斷及治療方法。

sentences.english: Batch processing was replaced by real-time processing.
sentences.chinese: 於是，實時處理取代了成批處理。

sentences.english: Objective Present paper aims at Summing up the experience of mass hot cement burn Casulties.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結成批熱水泥燒傷病人救治經驗。

sentences.english: How errors are handled when some batch requests fail
sentences.chinese: 成批請求失敗時如何處理錯誤。

sentences.english: Conclusion This method can be used in produce in quantity.
sentences.chinese: 結論可成批生產供臨牀使用。

sentences.english: Standard component mass productions, thus reduced the production cost.
sentences.chinese: 標準元件成批生產，因而降低了製造成本。

sentences.english: Many major corporations give their employees BlackBerrys, which are purchased in bulk.
sentences.chinese: 許多大公司爲它們的員工成批購買黑莓手機。

sentences.english: Having been trial-produced several times this new product will be put into mass production.
sentences.chinese: 這種新產品經過幾次試製，將投入成批生產。

sentences.english: High street stores will fail and close by the hundreds.
sentences.chinese: 鬧市區的商店將會成批的倒閉關門。

sentences.english: Practice has proved that the application of the method is effective and efficient in mass production.
sentences.chinese: 實踐證明，這種方法在成批生產中使用效果良好。

sentences.english: Large groups of Native Americans were forced to move away form their old hunting grounds.
sentences.chinese: 成批成批的美洲土著人被迫從他們原來的狩獵場遷走。

sentences.english: Large groups of Native Americans were forced to move away form their old hunting grounds.
sentences.chinese: 成批成批的美洲土著人被迫從他們原來的狩獵場遷走。
看來籃球也是“成批處理”的啊。

sentences.english: It mainly fulfills the function of decomposing the planning into batch ordering.
sentences.chinese: 此子系統主要功能是完成生產計劃分解成批生產指令。

sentences.english: Batch production of products should be do random inspection on a regular basis.
sentences.chinese: 成批生產的產品應定期做抽查檢驗。

sentences.english: The lights sometimes appear in groups.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的光線通常成批出現。

definition: making up a group, forming a troupe (idiom); in large numbers/as a large crowd
hundreds/a large number/lit. by the hundreds and thousands
lit. by the thousands and tens of thousands (idiom); untold numbers/innumerable/thousands upon thousands
